name: ema
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Exponential Moving Average(EMA) places greater importance on recent data points than the normal Moving Average(MA).

symbol.description: The financial instrument's symbol. Examples include 'AAPL' for Apple Inc., 'EUR/USD' for Euro to US Dollar, 'ETH/BTC' for Ethereum to Bitcoin, etc.

interval.description: The time interval between successive data points. Supported intervals include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', and '1month'.

series_type.description: The type of series to use in the calculations. Supported values are 'open', 'high', 'low', and 'close'. Defaults to 'close'.

format.description: The format of the response data. Supported values are 'JSON' and 'CSV'. Defaults to 'JSON'.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to return. Defaults to 30 when no date parameter is set, otherwise is set to the maximum available.

time_period.description: The number of periods to use in the calculation of the EMA. Defaults to 9.
